question:
Which of the following banks are part of the famous SHG-Bank linkage programme for microfinance in India ?
1. Regional Rural Banks (RRBs)
2. Cooperative banks
3. Commercial banks
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Regional Rural Banks (RRBs), Cooperative banks and Commercial banks are all part of the famous SHG-Bank linkage programme for microfinance in India.
